caseTitle: Riffat Shaheen v. The Government of KPK thr. Chief Secretary, Peshawar & others
tagline: The Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Buildings (Management, Control and Allotment) Act, 2018 and KPK Residential Accommodation at Peshawar (Procedure for Allotment) Rules, 1980 do not provide an automatic benefit to the spouse or children of a deceased or retired civil servant to retain the government accommodation on retirement/demise of the original allottee, however, their rights have been safeguarded by providing a special quota in the available government housing which is based on seniority of applications.
